title: Zuckerberg Testifies, Caterpillar’s Sales Dip, Nordstrom CEO on New Store
itunes:title: Zuckerberg Testifies, Caterpillar’s Sales Dip, Nordstrom CEO on New Store
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Financial Policy Analyst Ben Elliott breaks down Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's testimony before the Financial Services Committee on the risk of the cryptocurrency Libra. Joe Deaux, Bloomberg News Metals & Mining Reporter, discusses Caterpillar blaming global economic uncertainty for its sales dip. Erik Nordstrom, Nordstrom Co-President, walks through opening a new flagship store in Manhattan’s Central Park Tower. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Markets Senior Editor Mike Regan explain why the stock market has a lot of money riding on the 2020 election. And we Drive to the Close with Quincy Krosby, Chief Market Strategist at Prudential Financial.

Hosts: Carol Massar Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
